includedAssets.title: X
includedAssets.synopsis: Season 10 of the deliciously dark crime drama gets under way as new addition Jennifer Love Hewitt investigates a string of grisly murders.

includedAssets.synopsis: Garcia confronts the man she shot before he's executed on death row and the BAU look into a revenge plot. CS Lee (Dexter) guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Season 10
includedAssets.synopsis: Jennifer Love Hewitt joins the cast for the tenth season, as the team continue to pursue a variety of dangerous and deadly unsubs. Smash hit crime drama also starring Joe Mantegna, Matthew Gray Gubler, Shemar Moore, A.J. Cook and Thomas Gibson.

includedIn.title: Criminal Minds
includedIn.synopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
